name: adminforth
description: OpenSource Vue3 powered forth-generation admin panel

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run prepareDist && npm link
scripts.--comment-prepareDist: -rl allows supply the spa without symlinks which allows to not include source code in the package
scripts.rollout: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run rollout-doc && npm run put-git-tag
scripts.rollout-next: npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=next && npm publish --tag next && npm run put-git-tag
scripts.rollout-doc: cd documentation && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.--comment_postinstall: postinstall executed after package installed in other project package and when we do npm ci in the package
scripts.postinstall: if test -d ./dist/spa/; then cd ./dist/spa/ && npm ci && echo 'installed spa dependencies'; fi
scripts.ci-plugins: for d in plugins/*; do cd $d && npm ci && cd ../..; done
scripts.ci-adapters: for d in adapters/*; do cd $d && npm ci && cd ../..; done

author: devforth.io
